reviews.text: Do you want more 5-star Google reviews? Best of all, theyâ€™re free! We can provide as many as you need to help your business reach the top of Google Maps. Contact us on Telegram: @gthisjpeg

The whole restaurant concept feels well realized. This restaurant excels in customer service. King's Kitchen handles multiple diners effectively. Every dish pleased our palates completely. I will come to this spot for a meal.
The food was very delicious
Roast meats, noodle soups, congee, fried dough stick ğŸ‘ğŸ»â€¦
Great food. Good prices. Horrible service.
The beef pan fried noodles were salty, hard to eat. Other than that a simple restaurant no frills.

We dropped by for a brunch and picked out a selection from the specialty menu. The fish and tofu combo was my favorite as it was quite tender. The goose was a bit tough and was harder to get the meat off. The rice on the bottom of the clay pots were burnt, but otherwise decent
The food was really good, the waiters were really nice and helpful  and pretty cheap.
Lost their touch. Always love their bbq pork and roast pig. Now it always so dry up and hard. Need to find new place.

really terrific Cantonese place in Benson Hurst, Brooklyn. stopped by Sunday afternoon and the place was packed, was lucky to get a seat.  they are in the middle of the neighborhood where you can hardly find 30 feet without an Asian eatery, you can imagine that their food must stand out!   tried noodles soup with delicious chicken leg roasted softly to perfection, which made my day. looking forward to try other mouth salivated dishes I saw on the other patrons' tables. highly recommend!
Came here 1hr before they closed.  No bbq, no claypot left but I still ordered a bunch of other dishes and they all hit the spot.  Authentic cantonese dishes.  Def my new go to spot.
The waiter took my order wrong and rolled her eyes when I told her (before she redid the order).

Itâ€™s my first time going to this restaurant and everything was amazing. I ordered the wasabi fried calamari appetizer. Oh my goodness it was on point and for the main course I got a duck with rice very juicy and tender. The service was very, very friendly and really good.
Yum yum! This place has a verity of great food!
the food are excellentï¼Œ good envirment ï¼Œ good service.
IncreÃ­ble, servicio 10/10 te atienden, estÃ¡n pendientes, al entrar te sirven agua, son amables y la comida es deliciosa y a precios muy buenos

The roasted duck was very good but the noodle broth was very salty. I should have ordered meat over rice instead of noodles. Hard to communicate with the waiters too. Better to buy take out than dining in.
The stuff here is very good and very nice
Great food!
å¥½å¥½å‘³ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ»
I will definitely be back here again, the staff here are extremely helpful and kind  and the prices are out of this world, bang for your buck. Get all the meats and try it. You wonâ€™t regret it

So little meat for 9 dollars. I donâ€™t know if this is normal or not. I got the double meat set

This place is a 3/5 in person due to prices and 2/5 ordering due to prices and portions . This place rips the subtotal of a receipt and writes a general money value like 30USD on your uber eate receipt . Moreover , the prices are higher than in store, about 20% overall and I feel like you also get 10% less food, especially the more costly items like meat but a lot of rice added .  The meat tastes weird , like they put MSG powder all over and it does not taste fresh , it tastes almost like its preserved with some "chemicals".  To make matters worse , you usually get a lot or bone and unwanted non meat parts added to your meal like cartilage . Overall this place is probably okay in-person and just a sad thing for delivery on their third party platforms . I have never seen a receipt ripped with a " general USD price written on the paper like 34.20 total in reality says 30 USD ." Its almost like they give you as much food as much money you pay instead of it being a dish . I guess this is just Asian behavior .
The food was really good. The staff were very nice. The food was also very fresh.
Love the place, this is our go to place for lunch and dinner.
Greatå¹¿ä¸œGuangdong flavour.
This is the place to get some classic Hong Kong cuisine and the milk tea is to die for!
The food over here is not only extremely affordable, taste really really good, this is going to be my local favorite restaurant!!!
Super quick service and delicious food every time!
å¾ˆå¥½åƒäº†ğŸ˜‹
I ordered Crispy Roasted Pork over rice for my daughter and I had the 3 style BBQ meat and they're all delicious with a very reasonable price! Big portions too!

The food and service are amazing. If you want authentic Chinese food, this is the place to go. Sometimes it is a little busy, so you have to be a little bit patient with the line, but they will get to you. The workers and customers are really helpful too if you aren't comfortable with the language/accent barrier.
Great food great service!
Top chinese food choice, affordable price with good portion
Service and food was amazing!
I love the fish and meat here, tastes real nice, just how I like it
Great service and food

Being super busy on a wednesday afternoon is a sign the food is going to be amazing and it is! We ordered the roasted duck, clay pot vermicelli, pork chop noodles, and shumai rice roll, all incredible. The staff is super hard working and fast. Iâ€™ll be back!
Ordered eel clay pot rice and the red wine pepper steak special. Beef was tender and food was delicious.
Yummy
This is the go-to spot for delicious meals! Highly recommend their clay pots, rice rolls, and congee!
ååˆ†å¥½é£ŸğŸ˜‹
food is good, service is amazing
Food so good.  This the spot for bbq meats !

The food is good and yummy
Food is affordable and delicious!
Delicious

One of the best Chinese BBQ spots Iâ€™ve tried in a while. The Roasted Duck Leg Noodle Soup had tender duck with crispy skin and a broth that felt homemade. The Three Choices BBQ Rice (I picked roast duck, crispy pork, and soy chicken) came with generous portions, perfect seasoning, and fresh veggies. Even the milk tea was great â€” not overly sweet, just right. Delivery was quick, and everything was still hot and beautifully packed. Will 100% order again!

Amazing service and delicious food! You can get your order within 10 minutes freshly made! Plenty of options and the pricing is fair! If you are around itâ€™s worth the trip for this amazing food! 10/10 would for sure come back! Thank you for the great service!

If youâ€™re craving authentic Chinese cuisine served with warmth and efficiency, Kingâ€™s Kitchen is an absolute gem. This place is always bustling with energyâ€”a clear sign of how beloved it is by locals and visitors alikeâ€”but despite the crowd, the service never falters. The servers are incredibly attentive, friendly, and manage the busy floor with ease.

What really sets Kingâ€™s Kitchen apart, though, is the food. Every dish arrives fresh, piping hot, and packed with flavor. The menu is extensive, but I canâ€™t recommend their clay pot dishes enoughâ€”they are truly something special. My personal favorites? The braised brisket with tofu skin, which is melt-in-your-mouth tender and deeply savory, and the salted fish and chicken with eggplant, a beautifully balanced dish thatâ€™s both bold and comforting.

Whether youâ€™re a regular or a first-time diner, Kingâ€™s Kitchen never disappoints.

I had a fantastic experience dining here! The food was absolutely deliciousâ€”every dish was packed with flavor and made with care. What surprised me the most was how affordable everything was. You get generous portions for a great price, which is hard to find these days.

Their menu has a wide variety of options, so thereâ€™s something for everyone. Whether youâ€™re in the mood for something hearty or light, youâ€™ll find it here.

On top of that, the service was excellent. The servers were super friendly, attentive, and made us feel really welcome from the moment we walked in.

Such a nice, cozy place to eat with family or friends. The food is fresh and looks just as good as it tastes. Everyone working there is super friendly. Definitely wonâ€™t be my last visitâ€”highly recommend!

The food here is extremely good. My child loves it! If we go out to eat, most of the time we come here! It's also very healthy. No stomach aches after you eat here. Come to King's Kitchen and eat like a king!
The food here is good and Iâ€™ve been here a few times with my friends and family- always providing fast service and food is great. Look at the crispy pork ğŸ˜—. Always try their clay pot rice.

I recently had the pleasure of dining at Kingâ€™s Kitchen, a fantastic Chinese restaurant that truly impressed me. From the moment I stepped in, the ambiance was inviting and the service was warm and attentive.

Every aspect of my experience was outstanding. The dishes were bursting with authentic flavors, perfectly prepared, and beautifully presented. The ingredients were fresh, and the meticulous attention to detail in each dish was evident.

Everything I ordered exceeded my expectations. The balance of spices, the texture of the food, and the generous portions all contributed to a memorable dining experience.

Kingâ€™s Kitchen is a gem for anyone craving high-quality Chinese cuisine. I highly recommend it and look forward to returning soon to explore more of their delicious menu offerings.

Great service and great food. Super fresh!! Definitely recommend!

Today is Motherâ€™s Day! I am so happy I choose Kingâ€™s Kitchen! The $58 special combo for Motherâ€™s day is pricy and yummy! Amazing food! Will be back!

I ordered The BBQ meat combo , seafood congee, beef egg over rice bowl. They are all well made with fresh ingredients. Def a local gem!

We came here with my family for dinner and was shocked by how good and authentic the food is. We ordered 4 different clay pot rice: yellow eel, eel, pork ribs, chicken and mushroom! We loved all the dishes and was so affordable! Really recommend!
One of those places you walk into and through just smell, you know itâ€™ll be good. Good quality Chinese barbecue meats at unbeatable prices. And big fan of their rice rolls.

Good rice rolls and clay pot rice!

Kings Kitchen makes a large variety of Cantonese dishes. I generally always get a clay pot rice and the rice rolls with fried fritters.

I ordered the poached egg with beef but do check out the preserved meats clay pot rice  that is another great pick!

The rice gets nice and crispy on the bottom and is my favorite portion to eat.

The restaurant itself is getting a bit beat but I wouldn't say it's a dirty place or anything. Think very utilitarian, come in and eat but don't expect a cozy or cute ambience.

Been coming here mostly when we donâ€™t know what to eat and itâ€™s been solid throughout the years. Love their fried noodles with soy sauce because they make the noodles crispy unlike most places. Their mix sauce rice rolls hit the spot too!

I have lived in this neighborhood for ten years and reunite with my family here every week. Their barbecued pork is really great, sweet, fat but not greasy, and keeps the standard. I especially like the clay pot rice, which is soft and crispy. It is really made with care.

The service here is impeccable, with attentive staff who are knowledgeable about the menu and eager to provide recommendations. Every dish is presented beautifully, demonstrating a true dedication to both culinary artistry and authentic flavors.
I come here every week and they do not disappoint! Great food, affordable pricing and fast service!!
Been coming for years. Service & food has always been great & consistent. This is our familyâ€™s go to spot for barbeque meats!

Best deal in town for quality cantonese food on 86 st.  Been coming here for years with reliable roast ducks, soy sauce chicken, roast pork and siu yuk.  Clay pot and congee are also on top of there menu.  A+++
Has a great experience here with my coworkers! The staff were very friendly and accommodating to our big party. The char sui was fresh and best Iâ€™ve had in the neighborhood!
Always delicious! My partner and I come often and the food never fails to hit the spot! Service is friendly, and itâ€™s just good Chinese comfort food. Would definite recommend!

Kings Kitchen is the quintessential spot to get roasted meats. This time, I got the hot pepper beef dish and it is so delicious. The combination of hot peppers and onions go well with the tender beef. There are plenty of options to choose from and their entrees do not disappoint.
Been going here since they opened years ago. Best spot for claypot rice and traditional Cantonese dishes!

Came in with my family and Loved the food. Itâ€™s always our go to place for some authentic Cantonese food. Good portion, great taste and nice service. Canâ€™t go wrong with it, love it.
Absolutely fantastic! Exceptional food, attentive service, and a warm, inviting atmosphere. A true gemâ€”highly recommended!
The food here was great and so was the atmosphere. The service was quick and the workers were nice. Great deals all around and love coming to eat here with family!
Atmosphere is good. It was busy was able to be seated within 5 minutes. The food is good and the presentation of it is A+

Great food and portions. Selection of clay rice pots is excellent that combines both traditional and modern flavors.
The food here is very good. Me and my family love coming here to eat and itâ€™s one of our go to restaurants. The service here is excellent, and they are very nice. Totally recommend it!!
